price: 13. Idinka (Mu'miniinta ah) cabsida ay idiinku hayaan (Yuhuuddaa iyo munaafiqiintaa) laabahooda baa ka daran tay ugu hayaan Alle. Sidaas waxaa ugu wacan waa qolo aan wax fahmin.
arabic: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim mina al-lahi dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
